评论概述: A great everyday shirt. Not WOW but I expect to wear it often.
评论详情: This isn't the sort of blouse I'll put on when I want to impress someone. It's a basic short-sleeve button-down shirt to pull out of your closet on a random Wednesday -- which is actually its appeal. I don't always want to startle or surprise anyone, including myself. I look nice, I feel comfortable, and it goes with just about anything.  The fabric is the happy medium between "not too heavy" and "not too light," and it feels good on my skin. The neckline is good to show off a necklace, but not at all revealing. It's long enough to tuck into jeans, but not excessively so. The darts make this feel fitted without binding, and the (slightly odd) elastic smocking gives the style a nice shape.  The fit is true-to-size. There's no worries with the laundry, despite "hand wash only;" I wash everything in cold water, and I threw the shirt in the dryer. It doesn't show wrinkles at all, which is convincing me that this shirt will be a good choice for travel... particularly since the color and style suits my usual wardrobe.  Nobody will stop me on the street to say, "How lovely!" but I won't be embarrassed either.  Decent price, too. This is easy to recommend.
